sentences.en: "A cashmere sweater still thrills me," she admits. "It has wonderful staying power; it looks chic and modern."
sentences.cn: “羊绒衫仍是我的最爱，”她承认，“它不会过时，看起来既漂亮又时尚。”

sentences.en: Cashmere is the most luxurious materials.
Cashmere is valued for its softness and warmth without much weight.
sentences.cn: 因为柔软和暖和而且不增加太多总量.

sentences.en: Cashmere sweaters are elegant in texture and soft to the touch.
sentences.cn: 羊绒衫,质感高雅,触感柔软.

sentences.en: Cashmere: Animal - hair fibre forming the downy undercoat of the Kashmir goat.
sentences.cn: 山羊绒: 构成喀什米尔山羊绒毛层的动物纤维,属于特种动物毛纤维.

sentences.en: Her wardrobe consists primarily of huge cashmere sweaters and tiny Italian sandals.
sentences.cn: 她的衣物主要是宽大的开司米毛衣和小巧的意大利凉鞋。

sentences.en: Here is the cashmere sweater counter, what can I do for you?
sentences.cn: 这里就是毛衣专柜, 您想买什么?

sentences.en: I thought the highlight of the show was the cashmere coat.
sentences.cn: 我觉得表演中最精彩的要属开司米外衣.

sentences.en: I wish I could afford a cashmere sweater.
sentences.cn: 我希望我能买得起一件羊绒衫。

sentences.en: It has the advantages of both cashmere and mulberry silk.
sentences.cn: 它具有羊绒和桑蚕丝两者的优点.

sentences.en: It took hot competition from abroad, however, to show us just how good Scottish cashmere really is.
sentences.cn: 然而，我们是通过来自国外的激烈竞争才认识到了苏格兰羊绒的优良品质。

sentences.en: Our company is a production of silk fabrics, cashmere Qiao, Xiao Burnt - out.
sentences.cn: 我公司是一家生产真丝面料 、 乔绒 、 烂花绡.

sentences.en: She decided on a beige cashmere sweater.
sentences.cn: 她决定穿一件米色羊绒毛衣.

sentences.en: She wore a thick tartan skirt and a red cashmere sweater.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一条厚厚的格子呢裙和一件红色羊绒衫。

sentences.en: Some farmers comb their cashmere goats to remove the hair.
sentences.cn: 一些农民通过为开士米山羊梳理来脱羊毛.

sentences.en: The Cashmere summer suiting is from England! Soft and light, very comfortable!
sentences.cn: 采用英国进口的轻薄的夏季 喀什 米尔羊毛料,非常透气, 非常舒服唷!

words.tran_cn: 羊绒；开士米；[纺]开士米羊毛织品；开士米绒线

trans.tran_cn: 开司米，山羊绒，开士米羊毛织品
trans.tran_en: a type of fine soft wool
